name: Covid 2 - Electric Boogaloo
description:
Sick of lock-down?

Now you can defy lock-down from the safety of your home!

DELIVER ALL THE BURGERS!!!

- Drive around and make deliveries while the world is in lock-down. 

- Blow up cop cars with a mounted heavy machine gun.

- Boost around the environment, make as many deliveries as you can.

Controls:

- Two Touch pads control Left and Right.

- To reverse hold both Left and Right Touch pads together.

Can you bring world peace via burgers? or will you fall to system?
